Please use public transport whenever possible.", 'Our car park is open 24 hours a day and costs £3.20 per hour.', "There's more information on the parking at St Thomas' Hospital page.", "There's cycle parking facilities covered by CCTV.", 'Bicycle racks are located:', 'The phone for calling taxis is on the lower ground floor of Lambeth Wing.', "It's mounted on the wall outside of the patient transport department.", 'You may be able to use our transport service or get help with the cost of transport.', 'To help you find your way around, we have:', 'If you get lost or are unsure, please do ask a member of our staff.', 'To help you get to your appointment quickly and easily download our simple guide to finding your way.', ' ', "This is a simple guide with maps that's also available to pick up from:", 'We advise you to:', "If you are sent to another wing for tests or treatment, it's always best to go back to the ground floor to find your way there.", 'Ground floor, near the main entrance.', 'These toilets have additional space and equipment for people with disabilities.', "There's a height adjustable changing bench and hoist.", 'Signers can be arranged to help during your visit.', 'Please use the number on your appointment letter to let us know what help you need or contact us by:', 'Please give as much notice as possible.', 'Induction loops are available in the main reception.', 'Guide dogs may accompany you during your visit. Please call the number on your appointment letter to give your clinic staff as much notice as possible so they can accommodate this.', "Use the St Thomas' Hospital AccessAble guides for accessibility information.", "You can wear one of our sunflower lanyards if you have a hidden disability and want to let us know you might need some extra help. They're available at the main reception.", 'Find out more on the sunflower lanyards page.', 'The emergency (A&E) department is for serious conditions needing immediate treatment.', "It's open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.", "If you have a procedure, treatment or surgery, you'll stay on one of our wards.", "See all wards at St Thomas' Hospital.", ' Main entrance. ', ' Main entrance. Open 24 hours a day. ', ' Ground floor, North Wing. ', ' Ground floor, South Wing. ', ' Main entrance ', ' Main entrance. Includes Post Office counter. ', " Women's clothes and essentials. ", ' Phone 020 7188 2814 for an appointment ', ' Search for NHS WiFi network on your device. ', ' 1st floor, South Wing. Open 7am to 10pm, Monday to Friday. ', ' Near main reception. ', ' Central Hall, South Wing. Collection of historical items. ', 'Phone: 020 7188 6449', 'Email: [email protected]', "Address: St Thomas' day nursery, Gassiot House, Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH", 'Opening hours: Monday to Friday, 7am to 7pm (closed bank holidays)', 'Our nursery provides day care and education for children aged between 3 months and 5 years. We accept children from:', 'We provide full time, part time and emergency childcare places. Please contact the nursery for availability.', "Ofsted rated St Thomas' day nursery as good at their last inspection in 2016.", 'We follow the early years foundation stage (EYFS) statutory framework. This sets the standards that we must meet for:', 'We make sure we are supporting:', 'The accommodation department manages a range of accommodation for you and your visitors.', "The team treating you can refer you to stay at Simon Patient Lodge at St Thomas' Hospital. This is usually for people before or after a surgery or procedure when they do not need to stay on one of our wards.", "Gassiot House Lodge at St Thomas' provide rooms which can be booked on a nightly basis by: • pre/post appointment patients • relatives, carers and visitors", 'The rooms are designed to provide a non-clinical, safe and relaxing environment close to our hospital buildings. ', 'Rooms are available to be booked on a nightly basis. They cost £75 per night for a single room and £90 per night for a twin room.', "We're open from 9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday.", "Address: St Thomas' team, Gassiot House accommodation office, ground floor, Gassiot House, Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH ", 'Great Maze Pond London SE1 9RT Phone: 020 7188 7188', 'Sydney Street London SW3 6NP Phone: 020 7352 8121', 'Westminster Bridge Road London SE1 7EH Phone: 020 7188 7188', 'Hill End Road Harefield UB9 6JH Phone: 01895 823737', " © 2023 Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust "]

Skip to main content Our consultants Get involved Jobs Private patients For health professionals Education Research Donate Menu Visiting us Visiting us Our locations Our locations Guy's Hospital St Thomas' Hospital Evelina London Children's Hospital Royal Brompton Hospital Harefield Hospital Community health centres Outpatient appointments Staying in hospital Help with travel Staying safe during your visit Visiting a patient Waiting for your appointment or procedure Our services Our services Find a community health centre Find a consultant Find a ward Find a service Find a service Cardiovascular Community Dental Emergency care Kidney Maternity Sexual health Urology Guy's Cancer Your health records Flu and COVID-19 vaccinations About us About us Our organisation Our organisation Our staff Our Board Non-executive directors Membership Working with partners Council of Governors Our charities Our values and vision Our values and vision Equality and diversity Sustainability Publications Freedom of information Our plans for the future Our history Jobs News Events Research Education Contact us Menu Visiting us Our services About us Contact us Our consultants Get involved Jobs Private patients For health professionals Education Research Donate Toggle search Search for: (optional) Apply Sort by (optional) RelevanceMost recent Search for: (optional) Apply Sort by (optional) RelevanceMost recent Home St Thomas' Hospital Back to home St Thomas' Hospital Address: Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH Phone: 020 7188 7188 Travel information, finding your way around and accessibility Shops, cafes and other facilities Nursery Accommodation About St Thomas' Hospital Before your visit Please check which hospital or health centre you need to go to. Our locations Our hospitals are big and it can take a while to get to where you're supposed to be. Give yourself plenty of time to find your way to your appointment. How to find us Address Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH Contact us Phone: 020 7188 7188 How to find us St Thomas' Hospital on Google Maps Travelling from within London? Transport for London journey planner Travel information Safety at bus stops near the hospital There are cycle lanes and bus stop bypasses on Westminster Bridge Road and Lambeth Palace Road. Please take care when crossing the cycle lanes outside St Thomas' Hospital. Cyclists are reminded to take care and be aware of pedestrians when cycling past the bus stops. Parking St Thomas' Hospital is located in the Congestion Charging zone and the Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ). Parking is very limited at the hospital and there's often a queue. Please use public transport whenever possible. Our car park is open 24 hours a day and costs £3.20 per hour. There's more information on the parking at St Thomas' Hospital page. Bicycle There's cycle parking facilities covered by CCTV. Bicycle racks are located: at the front of the main reception (50 spaces) between the main entrance and Lambeth Wing entrance (40 spaces) alongside Gassiot House (50 spaces) next to the Florence Nightingale Museum (50 spaces) Taxis The phone for calling taxis is on the lower ground floor of Lambeth Wing. It's mounted on the wall outside of the patient transport department. Help with travel You may be able to use our transport service or get help with the cost of transport. At St Thomas' Hospital To help you find your way around, we have: large maps at our building entrances directories in lift lobbies, giving alphabetical lists of wards and outpatient clinics colour-coded building wings If you get lost or are unsure, please do ask a member of our staff. St Thomas' Hospital map (PDF 248.35KB) Simple guide to finding your way To help you get to your appointment quickly and easily download our simple guide to finding your way. A simple guide to finding your way (PDF 15.31MB) This is a simple guide with maps that's also available to pick up from: the main reception desk We advise you to: please bring your appointment letter with you. It will give you directions to a particular hospital site, hospital wing, lift (or stair) lobby and floor number when you arrive at the right wing, you should head for the lift or stairs, these will be clearly labelled, to reach the floor shown in your appointment letter when you get to the right floor, you will see signs that will guide you to the right department. If you are sent to another wing for tests or treatment, it's always best to go back to the ground floor to find your way there. Accessibility Changing Places toilet Ground floor, near the main entrance. These toilets have additional space and equipment for people with disabilities. There's a height adjustable changing bench and hoist. Sensory impairment Signers can be arranged to help during your visit. Please use the number on your appointment letter to let us know what help you need or contact us by: phone: 020 7188 8815 email: [email protected] Please give as much notice as possible. Hearing impairment Induction loops are available in the main reception. Guide dogs may accompany you during your visit. Please call the number on your appointment letter to give your clinic staff as much notice as possible so they can accommodate this. Access guides Use the St Thomas' Hospital AccessAble guides for accessibility information. Sunflower lanyards You can wear one of our sunflower lanyards if you have a hidden disability and want to let us know you might need some extra help. They're available at the main reception. Find out more on the sunflower lanyards page. Your care at St Thomas' Hospital Emergency department (A&E) The emergency (A&E) department is for serious conditions needing immediate treatment. It's open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. Our wards If you have a procedure, treatment or surgery, you'll stay on one of our wards. See all wards at St Thomas' Hospital. Cafes and restaurants M&S cafe Main entrance. Costa Coffee Main entrance. Open 24 hours a day. Toms@Riverside cafe Ground floor, North Wing. Toms@Shepherd Hall restaurant Ground floor, South Wing. Shops M&S Simply Food Main entrance WHSmith Main entrance. Includes Post Office counter. Stock Shop Women's clothes and essentials. Other facilities Creative Hairdressing salon Phone 020 7188 2814 for an appointment Free WiFI Search for NHS WiFi network on your device. St Thomas' Chapel 1st floor, South Wing. Open 7am to 10pm, Monday to Friday. Multi-faith prayer room Ground floor, South Wing. Cash machine Near main reception. Mini museum Central Hall, South Wing. Collection of historical items. St Thomas' Hospital nursery About our nursery Contact us Phone: 020 7188 6449 Email: [email protected] Address: St Thomas' day nursery, Gassiot House, Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH Opening hours: Monday to Friday, 7am to 7pm (closed bank holidays) Overview Our nursery provides day care and education for children aged between 3 months and 5 years. We accept children from: parent's working for Guy’s and St Thomas’ Trust other NHS employees families who live or work locally We provide full time, part time and emergency childcare places. Please contact the nursery for availability. Ofsted rated St Thomas' day nursery as good at their last inspection in 2016. St Thomas' day nursery Ofsted report Standards We follow the early years foundation stage (EYFS) statutory framework. This sets the standards that we must meet for: learning and development assessment safeguarding and welfare We make sure we are supporting: children's learning and development children's health children's safety parents Accommodation The accommodation department manages a range of accommodation for you and your visitors. Simon Patient Lodge The team treating you can refer you to stay at Simon Patient Lodge at St Thomas' Hospital. This is usually for people before or after a surgery or procedure when they do not need to stay on one of our wards. Gassiot House Lodge Gassiot House Lodge at St Thomas' provide rooms which can be booked on a nightly basis by: • pre/post appointment patients • relatives, carers and visitors The rooms are designed to provide a non-clinical, safe and relaxing environment close to our hospital buildings. Rooms are available to be booked on a nightly basis. They cost £75 per night for a single room and £90 per night for a twin room. Contacting the accommodation team Phone: 020 7188 0276 Email: [email protected] We're open from 9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday. Address: St Thomas' team, Gassiot House accommodation office, ground floor, Gassiot House, Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH Is this page useful? your visit Please check which hospital or health centre you need to go to. Our locations Our hospitals are big and it can take a while to get to where you're supposed to be. Give yourself plenty of time to find your way to your appointment. How to find us Address Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7EH Contact us Phone: 020 7188 7188 How to find us St Thomas' Hospital on Google Maps Travelling from within London? Transport for London journey planner Travel information Safety at bus stops near the hospital There are cycle lanes and bus stop bypasses on Westminster Bridge Road and Lambeth Palace Road. Please take care when crossing the cycle lanes outside St Thomas' Hospital. Cyclists are reminded to take care and be aware of pedestrians when cycling past the bus stops. Parking St Thomas' Hospital is located in the Congestion Charging zone and the Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ). Parking is very limited at the hospital and there's often a queue. Please use public transport whenever possible. Our car park is open 24 hours a day and costs £3.20 per hour. There's more information on the parking at St Thomas' Hospital page. Bicycle There's cycle parking facilities covered by CCTV. Bicycle racks are located: at the front of the main reception (50 spaces) between the main entrance and Lambeth Wing entrance (40 spaces) alongside Gassiot House (50 spaces) next to the Florence Nightingale Museum (50 spaces) Taxis The phone for calling taxis is on the lower ground floor of Lambeth Wing. It's mounted on the wall outside of the patient transport department. Help with travel You may be able to use our transport service or get help with the cost of transport. At St Thomas' Hospital To help you find your way around, we have: large maps at our building entrances directories in lift lobbies, giving alphabetical lists of wards and outpatient clinics colour-coded building wings If you get lost or are unsure, please do ask a member of our staff. Simon Patient Lodge The team treating you can refer you to stay at Simon Patient Lodge at St Thomas' Hospital. This is usually for people before or after a surgery or procedure when they do not need to stay on one of our wards. Gassiot House Lodge Gassiot House Lodge at St Thomas' provide rooms which can be booked on a nightly basis by: • pre/post appointment patients • relatives, carers and visitors The rooms are designed to provide a non-clinical, safe and relaxing environment close to our hospital buildings. Rooms are available to be booked on a nightly basis. They cost £75 per night for a single room and £90 per night for a twin room. Contacting the accommodation team Phone: 020 7188 0276 Email: [email protected] We're open from 9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday. p_tags: [' Bereich finden ', 'Verschaffen Sie sich mit unserem Bereichsfinder einen Überblick über unsere mehr als 80 Kliniken, Institute und Zentren sowie Zentralen Dienste.', ' Weg finden ', 'Unser Wegweiser zeigt Ihnen den Fußweg zu Ihrem ausgewählten Ziel und unterstützt Sie bei der Orientierung auf unserem Gelände.', ' Karriere ', 'Das UKE ist nicht nur eine der modernsten und renommiertesten Kliniken Europas, sondern auch ein attraktiver Arbeitgeber für verschiedenste Berufsgruppen.', ' Katheter bei schweren Schlaganfällen wirksam ', 'Eine Studie unter Leitung von Prof. Dr. Götz Thomalla, Klinik für Neurologie, hat ergeben, dass auch Patient:innen mit einem schweren Schlaganfall von einer Katheterbehandlung profitieren.', ' Neuigkeiten aus der UKE- Forschung ', 'Ursache von Medikamentenresistenz bei Bauchspeicheldrüsenkrebs identifiziert | Digitale Therapie hilft Multiple Sklerose-Patient:innen bei Depressionen | Individualisierte Krebstherapie', ' Gefährlicher Engpass: Herzinfarkt ', 'Ein Herzinfarkt ist lebensgefährlich. Wie er entsteht, welche Symptome er macht und wie die Behandlung aussieht, erklärt Kardiologin Priv.-Doz. Dr. Magnussen anlässlich des Weltherztages.', ' Bessere Prognose für Myelom-Patient:innen ', 'Einer UKE-Studie zufolge hat eine neuartige Kombination von vier Medikamenten die Prognose von Patient:innen mit einem Hochrisiko-Myelom deutlich verbessert. ', ' Neues aus der Forschung des UKE ', 'Hirntumore bei Kindern: schonendere Diagnostik I Organoidforschung Niere I Einflussfaktoren für Implementierung von PEF I ERC Starting Grant I CMV-Impfstoff: Studienteilnehmerinnen gesucht', ' Neue Leitung der Neurologie des UKE ', 'Zum 1. September übernehmen mit Prof. Dr. Götz Thomalla und Prof. Dr. Tim Magnus zwei international renommierte Experten der Schlaganfallforschung und -behandlung die Leitung der Neurologie.', ' Herzinfarkte und Schlag-anfälle wären vermeidbar ', 'Weltweite Studie unter UKE-Leitung zeigt: Über die Hälfte aller Herzinfarkte und Schlaganfälle sind durch die Kontrolle und Behandlung der klassischen Risikofaktoren vermeidbar. ', ' Bundesverdienstkreuz für Prof. Marylyn Addo ', 'Prof. Dr. Marylyn Addo ist für ihre herausragenden medizinischen und wissenschaftlichen Leistungen mit dem Verdienstorden der Bundesrepublik Deutschland ausgezeichnet worden. ', ' Gerinnungshemmer schützen nicht bei AHRE ', 'Studie unter UKE-Leitung zeigt: Bei Patient:innen mit Vorhofrhythmusstörung AHRE schützen Gerinnungshemmer nicht vor Schlaganfällen, Embolien und kardiovaskulären Todesfällen.', ' Pandemiebedingte Schulschließungen ', 'Wissenschaftler:innen der Uni Konstanz und des UKE fanden heraus, dass die pandemiebedingten Schulschließungen zur Verschlechterung der psychischen Gesundheit von Jugendlichen führten. ', ' Weitere Themen ', ' Mensch und Medizin – sie gehören auch beim Campus der Zukunft untrennbar zusammen. Die Medizin befindet sich in einem rasanten Wandel, der von Digitalisierung und Präzisions\xadmedizin geprägt ist. Grundlage für die Entwicklung im UKE ist der Zukunftsplan 2050: Er beschreibt die Medizin der Zukunft, stellt Menschen aus dem UKE vor, zeichnet innovative Prozesse nach und skizziert die intelligente Campus\xadgestaltung der kommenden Jahrzehnte. ', ' Erfahren Sie mehr über die Zukunft im UKE. ', ' Reitsport ist die beste Medizin ', 'Clelia hat nach Ferien auf dem Ponyhof das Reiten als Hobby entdeckt. Wie gesund es ist, hat die Kinderreporterin im Gespräch mit Dr. Julia Schmidt aus dem UKE Athleticum überrascht. ', ' Zeit zum Durchatmen mit dem Blick ins Grüne ', 'Hildegard Emmermann, Pastorin im Seelsorgeteam des UKE, stellt in der neuen Ausgabe der UKE Life ihren Lieblingsplatz Kirchwerder in den Marsch- und Vierlanden vor. ', ' Die neue Ausgabe der UKE Life ist da ', 'In der neuen Ausgabe der UKE Life stellen wir einen Patienten mit einer Lungenfibrose vor, der nur noch durch eine Lungentransplantation gerettet werden konnte. ', ' Brustkrebs: Wieder Vertrauen fassen ', 'Wie Stefanie Jentz nach ihrer Brustkrebs-Diagnose auf ihrem mehrjährigen Therapieweg zur „Kapitänin auf der Brücke“ wurde, schildert sie eindrücklich in der UKE Life und im Video.', ' „Für mich gibt es keinen Plan B“ ', 'Vanessa Schwentner studiert im 8. Fachsemester Humanmedizin. Neben Hörsaal, Bibliothek und klinischen Einsätzen arbeitet die 24-Jährige als studentische Hilfskraft.', ' Aufgeben ist keine Option ', 'Der kleine Toni verliert alle motorischen Fähigkeiten, die er zuvor gelernt hatte. Ausgelöst durch einen winzigen Genfehler, hat sich eine seltene Stoffwechselkrankheit entwickelt.', ' „Kindern Zeit so schön wie möglich machen" ', 'Menschen helfen, wieder gesund zu werden – das ist für viele ein wichtiger Grund, in die Pflegeausbildung zu gehen. Bei Sophia Samira Kretschmer kommen noch einige mehr dazu. ', ' Lieblingsplatz Bootssteg Bobby Reich ', 'Segelboote haben es dem gebürtigen Bayern Prof. Dr. Stefan Rutkowski, Direktor der Klinik für Pädiatrische Hämatologie und Onkologie im Kinder-UKE, angetan.', ' Vibes für die Seele ', 'Dass Musik bei psychischen Problemen helfen kann, ließ Kinderreporter Leon aufhorchen – und mit Musiktherapeut Hauke Böhmer in den Austausch kommen.', ' „Wechsel ins UKE genau richtige Entscheidung“ ', 'Zehn Jahre - die meiste Zeit davon in Hamburg - hatte er bereits in der Pflege gearbeitet, ambulant und in der Klinik. Seit einem dreiviertel Jahr ist Björn Kalle nun im UKE.', ' jukebox spielen? ', 'Mit der jukebox geht das UKE neue Wege in der Personalgewinnung: Im Online-Tool beantworten Pflegende 35 Fragen und bekommen als Ergebnis die am besten passenden Stationen des UKE angezeigt.', ' Spenden für das UKE ', 'Um Spitzenmedizin und Forschung weiter voranzubringen, benötigen wir Ihre Unterstützung.', ' UKE-Stiftung ', 'Wir laden Sie herzlich ein, mehr über die wertvolle Arbeit der UKE-Stiftung und ihre geförderten Forschungsarbeiten z.B. gegen Krebs, Diabetes oder Demenz zu erfahren.', ' Veranstaltungen ', 'Besuchen Sie eine von unseren zahlreichen Veranstaltungen – von Vorträgen und Seminaren bis zu Ausstellungen oder Konzerte und viele weitere mehr.', ' Pressemitteilungen ', 'Bleiben Sie immer auf dem Laufenden – in unseren Pressemitteilungen informieren wir über die neuesten Ereignisse aus dem UKE. ', ' Zukunftsplan 2050 ', 'Erfahren Sie mehr rund um das Thema Bauen auf dem UKE-Gelände, werfen Sie einen Blick in den Zukunftsplan 2050.', 'Nutzen Sie für Ihre Orientierung im UKE unseren Bereichsfinder.', 'Finden Sie außerdem Ärzt:innen, Wissenschaftler:innen sowie Mitarbeitende oder informieren Sie sich über Krankheitsbilder.', ' Letzte Änderung: 16.10.2023 ', 'RETTUNGSDIENST/NOTARZT 112 ZENTRALE NOTAUFNAHME (0 - 24 Uhr, Hauptgebäude O10) +49 (0) 40 7410 - 0 Notfallpraxis am UKE (Informationen und Hinweise)Notaufnahme Kinder-UKEGebäude O47 +49 (0) 40 7410 - 0 Lageplan Bereichsfinder Wegweiser SICHERHEITSDIENST DES UKE +49 (0) 40 7410 - 55555 ', ' LAGEPLAN Orientierungsplan Hauptgebäude O10 Ihre Anreisemöglichkeiten Ihre Anreise mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln: Hamburger Verkehrsverbund (HVV) StadtRad Hamburg Airport Hamburg ', ' Patient:innenbroschüre Das UKE in Leichter Sprache Life – das Magazin aus dem UKE Corona-Virus | COVID-19 Kontaktdaten | Orientierung ', 'SPENDENKONTO UKE gGmbHIBAN: DE54 2005 0550 1234 3636 36 Hamburger Sparkasse ONLINE-SPENDE UKE-STIFTUNG WEITERE INFORMATIONEN ', 'MARTINISTRASSE 52 20246 HAMBURG BITTE BEACHTEN: BEI DER EINGABE IN DAS NAVIGATIONSSYSTEM 20251 ALS POSTLEITZAHL EINGEBENVermittlung +49 (0) 40 7410 - 0 info@uke.de Feedback-Mechanismus zur Website, Barriere melden ', ' Über uns Presse Mediathek Karriere Impressum Datenschutzerklärungen Erklärung zur Barrierefreiheit ']

p_tags: ['Flu vaccination appointments available >', ' ', 'Notice to our Patients about Nuance Privacy Incident >', "Duke Children’s is ranked among the top 50 children's hospitals nationally in 10 specialties by U.S. News & World Report and retained its position at No. 1 in North Carolina. It is tied for #1 in the Southeast in the magazine's annual rankings for 2023-2024.", "Duke's pediatric cardiology and heart surgery program is ranked second in the nation and remains the best program for children with heart disease in North Carolina.", 'Karen Kump of Elko, Nevada, knew the lump on her right breast should be checked by a doctor when she first noticed it in July 2022. “But my granddaughter was getting married, and I wanted the attention to be on her,” she said. Kump, 78, didn’t know the mass was a rare type of breast cancer called a phyllodes tumor. Within two months, Kump needed a mastectomy because it had grown so big, so fast. Now, the retired schoolteacher is participating in phyllodes tumor research at Duke Health. “I’m hoping others might benefit from what I went through,” she said.']
h3_tags: ['Give Us a Call', 'Duke Health Blog', ' Events ']
div_tags: [" DukeHealth home page Menu Search Submit Duke Health Find a Doctor Search Treatments Find a Location Schedule Appointments Online For Providers and Researchers Provider Resources Career Opportunities Duke School of Medicine Give Us a Call 855-855-6484 What's New Patient Announcements Flu vaccination appointments available > Notice to our Patients about Nuance Privacy Incident > Duke Children’s Hospital Is Ranked No. 1 in North Carolina Duke Children’s is ranked among the top 50 children's hospitals nationally in 10 specialties by U.S. News & World Report and retained its position at No. 1 in North Carolina. It is tied for #1 in the Southeast in the magazine's annual rankings for 2023-2024. Duke's pediatric cardiology and heart surgery program is ranked second in the nation and remains the best program for children with heart disease in North Carolina. Helping Advance Phyllodes Tumor Research Karen Kump of Elko, Nevada, knew the lump on her right breast should be checked by a doctor when she first noticed it in July 2022. “But my granddaughter was getting married, and I wanted the attention to be on her,” she said. Kump, 78, didn’t know the mass was a rare type of breast cancer called a phyllodes tumor. Within two months, Kump needed a mastectomy because it had grown so big, so fast. Now, the retired schoolteacher is participating in phyllodes tumor research at Duke Health. “I’m hoping others might benefit from what I went through,” she said. It is tied for #1 in the Southeast in the magazine's annual rankings for 2023-2024. Duke's pediatric cardiology and heart surgery program is ranked second in the nation and remains the best program for children with heart disease in North Carolina. ", ' Helping Advance Phyllodes Tumor Research Karen Kump of Elko, Nevada, knew the lump on her right breast should be checked by a doctor when she first noticed it in July 2022. “But my granddaughter was getting married, and I wanted the attention to be on her,” she said. Kump, 78, didn’t know the mass was a rare type of breast cancer called a phyllodes tumor. Within two months, Kump needed a mastectomy because it had grown so big, so fast. Now, the retired schoolteacher is participating in phyllodes tumor research at Duke Health. “I’m hoping others might benefit from what I went through,” she said. ', 'Karen Kump of Elko, Nevada, knew the lump on her right breast should be checked by a doctor when she first noticed it in July 2022. “But my granddaughter was getting married, and I wanted the attention to be on her,” she said. Now, the retired schoolteacher is participating in phyllodes tumor research at Duke Health. “I’m hoping others might benefit from what I went through,” she said. p_tags: [' 亀田総合病院の外来は、救命救急センター、高気圧酸素治療外来（救命救急センター1階）、生殖医療科（ARTセンター）（G棟）、透析センター（G棟）、血液・腫瘍内科、腫瘍内科・がんゲノム診療科、腎移植科、がんサポート外来、臨床遺伝科、がん看護外来、放射線治療センター、婦人科‧乳腺科の一部の診療（C棟） その他の一般外来は同敷地内の亀田クリニックで行っております。 亀田クリニックでは、待ち時間を少なくするため「予約診療」を行っています。診療を受けられる方は、はじめての方でもまず“受診の予約”にご協力ください。予約は数名の方が同じ予約時刻枠となる「時間帯予約」です。また、診療の都合により予約時刻よりお待ちいただく場合があります。予めご了承ください。 受診当日は、健康保険証、老人医療受給者証、公費受給者証ほかを持参ください。 English here', '令和４年度 亀田総合病院 病院指標を公開しました。（2023.9.25）', 'English here', '※疾患の診療相談については、正確な情報がございませんと間違った判断をする可能性があります。ご予約の上、受診していただければと存じます。', '2012年から亀田メディカルセンターがメインスポンサーとなって毎年続いているKameda Cup in Kamogawa。去る2023年7月16日（日）に鴨川市の地域の皆様からの温かいご理解と支援の下、記念すべき第10回大会を無事開催することができました。 例年通り、全国からサーフィンが大好きな医療人が集まるサーフィン大会と、地元のダンスチームやバンドによるステージイベント、また、新たな試みでビーチスポーツ等のイベントを行い、子供から高齢者の方、障害を持つ方々まで多様な方に楽しんでいただくことができました。ご協力いただいた多くの皆さま、本当にありがとうございました。', ' KamedaCUP事務局']

亀田総合病院の外来は、救命救急センター、高気圧酸素治療外来（救命救急センター1階）、生殖医療科（ARTセンター）（G棟）、透析センター（G棟）、血液・腫瘍内科、腫瘍内科・がんゲノム診療科、腎移植科、がんサポート外来、臨床遺伝科、がん看護外来、放射線治療センター、婦人科‧乳腺科の一部の診療（C棟） その他の一般外来は同敷地内の亀田クリニックで行っております。 亀田クリニックでは、待ち時間を少なくするため「予約診療」を行っています。診療を受けられる方は、はじめての方でもまず“受診の予約”にご協力ください。予約は数名の方が同じ予約時刻枠となる「時間帯予約」です。また、診療の都合により予約時刻よりお待ちいただく場合があります。予めご了承ください。 受診当日は、健康保険証、老人医療受給者証、公費受給者証ほかを持参ください。 English here 病院指標を公開しました。（2023.9.25） 亀田総合病院 病院指標 病院情報 採用情報 お問い合わせ 亀田総合病院（代表） 04-7092-2211 ※ 8：00～17：00（日曜・祝日除く） ※ 救命救急センターは24時間対応しております。 English here よくある質問 お問い合わせフォーム ※疾患の診療相談については、正確な情報がございませんと間違った判断をする可能性があります。ご予約の上、受診していただければと存じます。 地域とともに 2012年から亀田メディカルセンターがメインスポンサーとなって毎年続いているKameda Cup in Kamogawa。去る2023年7月16日（日）に鴨川市の地域の皆様からの温かいご理解と支援の下、記念すべき第10回大会を無事開催することができました。 例年通り、全国からサーフィンが大好きな医療人が集まるサーフィン大会と、地元のダンスチームやバンドによるステージイベント、また、新たな試みでビーチスポーツ等のイベントを行い、子供から高齢者の方、障害を持つ方々まで多様な方に楽しんでいただくことができました。ご協力いただいた多くの皆さま、本当にありがとうございました。 KamedaCUP事務局 よくアクセスされるページ 診療科・部門紹介 当院へのアクセス よくある質問 当院はJCI（Joint Commission International）認証取得病院です。 当院はISO9001認証を取得しております。 当院が「World's Best Hospitals 2023」に選ばれました。 国際規格である「ISO15189：2012」の認定を2017年７月13日付で取得しています。 Twitter Facebook YouTube 地域とともに 2012年から亀田メディカルセンターがメインスポンサーとなって毎年続いているKameda Cup in Kamogawa。去る2023年7月16日（日）に鴨川市の地域の皆様からの温かいご理解と支援の下、記念すべき第10回大会を無事開催することができました。 例年通り、全国からサーフィンが大好きな医療人が集まるサーフィン大会と、地元のダンスチームやバンドによるステージイベント、また、新たな試みでビーチスポーツ等のイベントを行い、子供から高齢者の方、障害を持つ方々まで多様な方に楽しんでいただくことができました。ご協力いただいた多くの皆さま、本当にありがとうございました。 KamedaCUP事務局 ', ' よくアクセスされるページ 診療科・部門紹介 div_tags: [' ', ' English | Français | Logo UZ Leuven English | Français | Uw dossier Show more Zoeken Uw browser is verouderd Het lijkt erop dat u een verouderde browser gebruikt. Dit kan problemen veroorzaken met sommige delen van de website. Werk bij naar de meest recente versie van uw browser of gebruik een andere browser zoals Google Chrome. Samen grenzen verleggen voor een betere gezondheidszorg Meest gezochte diensten Algemene interne geneeskunde Anesthesiologie Gynaecologie en verloskunde Hart- en vaatziekten Kindergeneeskunde Neurologie Maag-, darm- en leverziekten Oogziekten Orthopedie Radiologie Bekijk alle diensten en afdelingen of bekijk alle artsen. Snel naar Huisartsen Raadplegingen Opname Bezoek Wenskaart sturen Ziekten, onderzoeken en behandelingen Vacatures en stages Internationale patiënten Steun ons Nieuws Meer nieuws Meer orgaansparende chirurgie bij peniskanker dankzij gecentraliseerde zorg 5 oktober 2023 Peniskanker is een bijzonder zeldzame en agressieve kanker. Dankzij de op eigen initiatief uitgebouwde centralisatie van medische zorg voor peniskanker in België, kunnen meer mannen met de aandoening nu een groter functioneel gedeelte van hun penis behouden dan vroeger, zonder dat er meer complicaties zijn. PET-scan kan complicatie bij bloedvaatziekte voorspellen 3 oktober 2023 Onderzoekers van UZ Leuven hebben aangetoond dat een PET-scan een nuttig hulpmiddel is om het verloop van de bloedvaatziekte giant cell arteritis (GCA) te voorspellen. Patiënten bij wie de bloedvaten veel fluoro-deoxy-glucose (FDG) opnemen tijdens de scan, blijken meer kans te hebben op een aorta-aneurysma. Eerste week zonder infuusvoeding op intensieve zorg geeft betere bloedsuikercontrole 28 september 2023 Een grote vergelijkende studie bevestigt dat het geen goed idee is om te snel infuusvoeding te geven aan patiënten tijdens hun eerste week op intensieve zorg. De nood aan het bijsturen van bloedsuikergehalte met een insulinepomp blijkt minder groot wanneer patiënten geen vroege infuusvoeding krijgen. Evenementen Alle evenementen Infoavond nierfunctievervangende therapie Datum: 24 oktober 2023 Locatie: Niercentrum, campus Gasthuisberg Tijdens deze informatieavond brengen we de impact van een nierfunctievervangende therapie op het dagelijkse leven in kaart. U kunt zich inschrijven voor een van de vier onderwerpen. Rouw is rauw: omgaan met verlies na kanker Datum: 26 oktober 2023 Locatie: Bach, campus Gasthuisberg Je verloor recent of al langer geleden iemand die je graag zag aan kanker. Moet je nu komen tot ‘aanvaarding’ zoals vaak wordt gezegd? Is het normaal dat ik maar blijf huilen of juist helemaal geen tranen meer heb? Welke gevoelens en gedachten komen vaak terug in een rouwproces? Kanker, vroegtijdige menopauze en effecten van antihormoontherapie bij borstkanker Datum: 9 november 2023 Locatie: Online via Microsoft Teams In deze sessie gaan we in op het ontstaan van de menopauze en de klachten die daardoor kunnen ontstaan. Er wordt advies aangereikt om met deze klachten om te gaan. Ligging en bereikbaarheid Campus Gasthuisberg +32 16 33 22 11Herestraat 493000 LeuvenRoutebeschrijving en voorzieningen Campus Pellenberg +32 16 33 22 11Weligerveld 13212 PellenbergRoutebeschrijving en voorzieningen Campus Sint-Rafaël +32 16 33 22 11Kapucijnenvoer 73000 LeuvenRoutebeschrijving en voorzieningen 750.000 Raadplegingen 63.000 Spoedgevallen 53.000 Opnames 123.000 Dagopnames 56.000 Operaties 10.011 Medewerkers Meer dan een ziekenhuis UZ Leuven is een universitair ziekenhuis waar patiënten kunnen rekenen op gespecialiseerde zorg en innovatieve behandelingen, gecombineerd met menselijke aandacht en respect voor elke persoon. Meer dan 10.000 gepassioneerde medewerkers geven elke dag de beste zorg op maat. Toekomstige zorgverleners en medewerkers krijgen in UZ Leuven een hoogstaande opleiding, met het oog op levenslang leren en innoveren. Als pionier in klinisch onderzoek werkt het ziekenhuis ook mee aan de patiëntenzorg van morgen. Meer over UZ Leuven Contact +32 16 33 22 11 Herestraat 49, 3000 Leuven Alle contactgegevens Vind ons ook op: Facebook Twitter Instagram LinkedIn Raadpleging en opname Raadpleging Dagziekenhuizen Opname Bezoekuren Stuur een wenskaart Over UZ Leuven Kwaliteitsvolle zorg Organisatie Missie en visie Nieuws en evenementen Steun ons Jobs Professionals Klinische studies Opleiding Stages Research Extranet International office Pers en media Onze verdiensten Babyvriendelijk Ziekenhuis Sinds 2008 heeft UZ Leuven het internationale kwaliteitslabel ‘Babyvriendelijk Ziekenhuis’ Top Employer UZ Leuven mag zich Top Employer noemen. Dat is een erkenning voor bedrijven met een uitmuntend hr-beleid. Spoedgevallen 53.000 Opnames 123.000 Dagopnames 56.000 Operaties 10.011 Medewerkers Meer dan een ziekenhuis UZ Leuven is een universitair ziekenhuis waar patiënten kunnen rekenen op gespecialiseerde zorg en innovatieve behandelingen, gecombineerd met menselijke aandacht en respect voor elke persoon. Meer dan 10.000 gepassioneerde medewerkers geven elke dag de beste zorg op maat. Toekomstige zorgverleners en medewerkers krijgen in UZ Leuven een hoogstaande opleiding, met het oog op levenslang leren en innoveren. Als pionier in klinisch onderzoek werkt het ziekenhuis ook mee aan de patiëntenzorg van morgen.
